titleStmt.title: The art of law-giving in III books ... : to which is added an appendix concerning an House of Peers / by J. Harrington.
titleStmt.author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Henry Fletcher ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

(from t.p.) Shewing the foundations and superstructures of all the kinds of government -- Shewing the frames of the commonwealths of Israel and of the Jewes -- Shewing a model fitted unto the present state or balance of this nation.
